product_name: Continental Trail King 29er Tire - 29 x 2.2 / 29 x 2.4
long_description: The large-volume, all-mountain Contental Trail King 29er tire delivers solid handling and control for your big-wheeled trail sessions. Designed to handle all-mountain riding with confidence, aggressive side knobs hook up well when cornering; open center tread pattern clears mud quickly. Tread pattern also offers responsive handling and braking in wet, muddy conditions. Continental Trail King 29er mountain bike tire features a 84 tpi casing with steel wire bead.
short_description: The large-volume, all-mountain Contental Trail King 29er tire delivers solid handling and control for your big-wheeled trail sessions.
